snippet.description: * Where to Donate in Queens (clueweb12-0007wb-42-16461) http://queens.about.com/od/lifestyleandinterests/tp/donations.htm ...at the front door. This is a great place to donate because they need something for everyone in the family: clothes, toys, games, computers, strollers, school supplies. Find more Queens family shelters at NYC.gov. zSB(3,3)Build It Green! NYC, Astoria, Queens317 26th Ave Astoria, NY 11102, 718-777-0132 Build It Green!
